channel.title: Subsurface Energy Storage and Extraction
channel.description: A site that hosts my research on the topics relevant to the subsurface storage and extraction of energy

item.title: Subsurface Energy
item.dc:creator: Ali A. Eftekhari
item.description:
Subsurface energy: storage and extraction

This website is a place to share the findings of my research on the extraction of energy from and storage of energy in the Danish onshore and offshore subsurface.
